Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, close to train station”
Reviews.Author: MTNR_FAN
Reviews.Content: hotel right next chamartin station access cars taxis difficult unless know location views ugly well although also see new 4 madrid need room want pay lot nearly always good place stay building works going breakfast poor summer nice pool swim real tryp hotel average general

Reviews.Title: “Good Service”
Reviews.Author: WONG C Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: walk chamartin metro station following signs towards plaza de end parking lot look right hotel however proximity metro station noise also less 15 minute ride sol would definitely stay go madrid room clean large staff friendly spoke english bathtub nice comfy 12th floor view pool didnt get use pool green perhaps stop cleaning winter youre looking forward swimming would check first three twin beds larger normal twins two pushed together inroom safe didnt work said would fix never made arrangements werent staying long didnt want wait around room someone come left everything came paid euro saturday sunday night stay great deal

Reviews.Title: “Not quite 4* but a pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: babyboo80
Reviews.Content: hotel cool stayed tour 2 nights neighborhood definitely far city center close train station however hotel clean budget would things train ride city day breakfast also tasty seems relatively modern nice theme pool flat screen tv shower large clean well staff nice wifi extremely expensive

Reviews.Title: “This should be downgraded to a 2 star property”
Reviews.Author: LondonIrishlass
Reviews.Content: stranded madrid due delayed flight hotel supposed serve economy class passengers 20 minutes bus airport older rooms clean well maintained mattress could better like hard beds cheap side since departure early couldnt breakfast buffet offered us simply swimming pool looked nice though reception attitude rather guard exceeded expectations terms assistance hospitality even english

Reviews.Title: “Great property”
Reviews.Author: uptowngirl57
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights premium room didnt receive anything extra except premium bedding first went check told havent got reservation said woman reception asked pay use internet get number although free premium guests told number still said came pc check said send email impressed got room phoned asked water told use bathroom water drink also asked tea coffee told normal although paid premium room 1st half hour eventually got speak someone manager 1 hour checked told everything told see check went room everything missing put room 3 days late thought checked told come back could free meal another paid premium room got none extras pay internet customer service worst ever

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - we emphatically reccomend this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: LanPing
Reviews.Content: ive stayed sol melia hotels including tryp almost every week past year reason chose hotel relatively close office next train station chamartin compared hotels ive stayed definitely impressed tryp breakfast buffet ok service wasnt bad wasnt inviting tryp hotels ive stayed hotel rooms seemed old need renovation impression fitness center reading description hotel although allowed access nearby health centre 20 euros anyway horrible definitely good

Reviews.Title: “If only I could think of something good to say!”
Reviews.Author: jwjwjwjw1
Reviews.Content: clean nice rooms bathrooms pool buffet restaurant smoking area site within short walking distance chamartin station perfect get areas madrid steps hotel desk inside hotel storage area luggage arrive early like thankfully room available able checkin early computer lobby pay use extremely slow allowed print anything also lobby suggest using phone card would definitely stay reccommend others traveling madrid

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place!”
Reviews.Author: pjshakespeare
Reviews.Content: easy move around madrid chamartin station next door much around hotel however corner convenient serves good food breakfast buffet hotel nice get rate breakfast included dinner buffet cost effective go eat train station internet access expensive possible get room rate breakfast internet good deal family rooms nice 2 adults 2 convenient hub vacation madrid

Reviews.Title: “Just ok...”
Reviews.Author: LizzVal
Reviews.Content: plus side hotel conveniently located near chamartin station therefore taxis metro large clean quiet room spacious bathroom minus side haul luggage steep flight steps reach elevators steps get front desk terribly important asked sign another paper asked youre chance read actually given receive email tryp hotel chain feel shouldnt necessary computer lobby one pays eur 200 15 minutes much going rate

Reviews.Content: convenient location close stations metro train clean staff helpful friendly great view windows looking plaza de good value money storage room leave belongings clean room every day would like modern new furniture room neat quite big bathroom clean big thing wifi internet free charge quite expensive

Reviews.Title: “Not 4 stars that the hotel claims, but just a 3-star”

Reviews.Content: stated reviewers hotel bit hard find first entrance placed oddly back building opposite train metro station come taxi ask dropped train station ground level entrance metro enter place realise hotel four stars lobby although bit quirky entrance noted functional friendly helpful staff rooms excellent roomy huge double bed facilities would usually expect three star plus extras given bath robe slippers ironing facilities well hair dryer bathroom room clean smells new modern decor real complaint could get system work properly arrived housekeeping set quite warm meaning room hot solved switching opening windows minutes rest stay left aircon system worked fine would suggest though anyone else obviously hotel problem one inform reception get fixed times used restaurant breakfast decided go breakfast 9 euros person granted little steep side buffet excellent wide variety importantly stays open 11am madrid bars far parking concerned hotel provide expensive rate 25 euros day arrived saturday afternoon found spot street outside parking spaces free weekend easy find spot stayed monday afternoon thus sunday moved car underneath large bridge outside station opposite hotel parking dirt spots marked neither spaces arrive quiet time day bit find good parking car appeared safe obviously wouldnt park anywhere else large city trip metro madrid quite fast although appears far actually take 10 minutes reach sol metro station metro station almost worth visit overall enjoyed stay hotel thoroughly pleasantly surprised high standards get good rate would highly recommend staying

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights august really enjoyed stay originally booked hotel however arrived large group booking wed amadeus hotel hotel 10 minute walk train bus stations centrally located public transport 30 min walk san marco square walking best way see venice room small expected nicely appointed excellent air conditioning good bathroom miss wifi available 2 days lobby option 8 euros hour far instead used wifi several restaurants week italy partner loved breakfasts good selection eggs bacon pastries ham cheese fruit cereals usual drinks breakfast running 11am
